long_description: The Carlisle Taboo stand up paddle easily converts from a single-bladed, SUP paddle to a double-bladed paddle you can use from a sitting position. Alumimum shaft and durable polypropylene blade stand up to on-the-water use. The Taboo includes 2 T-grip handles: 1 handle creates an SUP paddle that's 75 in. and the other extends the SUP paddle length to 82 in. If the wind kicks up and you need to sit down on your paddleboard, the Taboo converts to a 230cm, double-bladed paddle.
short_description: The Carlisle Taboo stand up paddle easily converts from a single-bladed, SUP paddle to a double-bladed paddle you can use from a sitting position.
